title: Introducing: Nightlives
content:
Formerly known as ttthick as ttthieves, and now reborn as Nightlives, Brent and Jordan from Toronto are set to release their debut LP A Wink In The Face Of Death later this month. With considered black and white imagery and slightly mysterious press photos, Nightlives have all the makings of a future internet sensation, following in the footsteps of the likes of The Neighbourhood and KO KO (now known as Pacific Air). Debut single Underneath is a twisted pop gem, fusing shoegaze influences with slicker electronic elements to master a swirling behemoth of a track that crescendo’s to a cacophony of reverb heavy guitars and midi drum samples, yet with an addictive undertone. It may be a relatively simple sound, but boy do they nail it. Check out Underneath below, and grab a free download from their bandcamp, as well as the first album teaser.
